name: Going The Distance - GMTK22
description:
A Solo submission game created in 14 hours for the GameMakersToolKit Game jam 2022

A simple new take on a physics based Platformer, Rage inducing, stategic thinking and requires a ton of luck. Fling your Dice as far as you can through randomly generated land and see just how far you can go!

Controls:

Left-Mouse Click: Fire
Right-Mouse Click: Slow down aimer

Credits:

All Coding & Artwork was made by Fmlad (myself)
Audio was taking and mixed using freesounds & audacity.

"Getting it Done" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
